Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees will send a hot-hitting Jazz Chisholm to the plate against the Chicago Cubs and Dansby Swanson, who has been on a tear in recent games.
The New York Yankees average 1.5 home runs per game and have hit a league-leading 213 home runs in total.
The Cubs’ 149 home runs rank 19th in Major League Baseball.
The game is scheduled for Saturday, September 7, 2024, at 2:20 p.m. ET at Wrigley Field in Chicago, Illinois.
The game will be broadcast on Marquee Sports Network and available for live streaming on Fubo.
The Yankees are favored to win with odds of -141, while the Cubs are the underdogs with odds of +120. The over/under for the game is set at 7.
